translations.translation: And as for poets, it is the misled who follow them.
As for the poets, only those who go astray follow them.
As for poets, only the wayward follow them.
Only the erring people follow the poets.
And the astray follow the poets.
As for the poets, the astray follow them,
And as to the poets, those who go astray follow them.
And the poets -- the perverse follow them;
As for poets, the erring follow them.
And as for the poets -- it is the misled who follow them.
As for the poets -it is the seduced who follow them.
As for the poets, [only] the perverse follow them.
And the Poets,- It is those straying in Evil, who follow them:
As for the poets, the erring follow them,
Poets are followed by the perverse.
And as for the poets—the deviators follow them.
And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;
[26:224] As for the poets, [only] the perverse follow them, in their poetry, propounding it and reciting it on their behalf to others; they are thus reprehensible.
(As for poets) 'Abdullah Ibn al-Zib'ari and his host who composed poetry, (the erring follow them) those who transmit poetry relate it from them.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلشُّعَرَآءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ ٱلْغَاوُونَ } معناه عُصاةُ الجنِّ وقال: هما الشَّاعران يَتَهاجيان؛ فيكونُ لهذَا أتباعٌ، ولِهذَا أتباعٌ؛ فَهُمْ الغُواةُ
 وقال: هُمُ الرِّواةُ

translations.translation:
And the {shu'ara'} (singular: sha'ir) are those who are followed by the {ghawan} (singular: ghawiy). This means that the {'usati} (singular: 'asi) of the jinn are those who are followed by the {ghawan}. They are the {ghuwan}.


And he said: "They are the narrators."

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } من جملة أولياء الشياطين المنتسبون إليهم بالنسبة الكاملة الكاذبة: { ٱلشُّعَرَآءُ } المذبذبون بين الأنام بأكاذيب الكلام وأباطيله؛ لذلك { يَتَّبِعُهُمُ ٱلْغَاوُونَ } [الشعراء: 224] الضالون من جنود الشياطين، المستتبعون لهم؛ لترويج أباطيلهم الزائفة
